subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Russia qualified for next year’s Beijing Olympics at the expense of the United States with a five-game victory against the Americans on the final day of the men’s World Cup in Tokyo. The United States can still reach the Olympics through other qualifiers, including a regional qualifier Jan. 5-13 in Puerto Rico.
